markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Janni Hospitality](/Feats.aspx?ID=2585) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can use magic to show others desert hospitality. You can cast 2nd-level [_create food_](/Spells.aspx?ID=52) once per day and [_create water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=53) twice per day as arcane innate spells.
name: Janni Hospitality
